Question: The following year (1910), this person toured Australia.
Hints: This person chronicled his debunking exploits in his book, A Magician Among the Spirits, co-authored with C M.
Radner allowed choice pieces of the collection to be displayed at The ____ Magical Hall of Fame in Niagara Falls, Ontario.
In 1906 this person started showing films of his outside escapes as part of his vaudeville act.
